title: Annie Oakley
subtle: Tall Tale (fiction), 760 words, Level O (Grade 2), Lexile 570L
description: This tall tale features Annie Oakley, a real Western heroine from American history. Readers will learn about Annie's life, from her learning to shoot at her father's side to how she became the fastest and sharpest shooter in Buffalo Bill's Wild West show. You won't believe this woman's talent!
highFrequencyWords: famous, feats, pheasants, quintuple, rifle, sharpshooter, tale, talent, telegram
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Consonant Digraphs : Identify consonant digraphs th and sh
phonics: Homophones                : Identify and understand the use of homophones
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
